Measures of comparison based on Orthogonal Procrustes Analysis

compMeas.Rd

Measures of comparison based on Orthogonal Procrustes Analysis

Usage

compMeas(bp, target = NULL, testee = NULL, centring = TRUE)

Arguments

target

target configuration

testee

testee configuration

centring

logical argument to apply centring or not (default is TRUE)

Value

PS

Procrustes Statistic

CC

Congruence coefficient

AMB

Absolute Mean Bias

MB

Mean Bias

RMSB

Root Mean Squared Bias

Res.SS

Residual sum of squares

Tot.SS

Total sum of squares

Fit.SS

Fitted sum of squares

On this page
